DOC.brief_title: Partner Involvement During Pregnancy Its Association With Maternal Health Behaviors
DOC.detailed_description: Paternal support relate positive pregnancy outcome . We explore relationship paternal involvement maternal smoking alcohol consumption pregnancy . This IRB-approved cross sectional study . Pregnant woman age 18 - 44 year old partner survey outpatient OB/GYN office Thomas Jefferson University . Women identify partner main support include . Demographic health information collect . A composite support score woman generate modified version Norbeck Social Support Questionnaire ( NSSQ ) scale 5 - 35 . Support score evaluate woman 's current smoking drinking status use ANOVA Student 's t-test .
